summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6073 for the improvement of 37th Avenue Southwest from West Hudson Street to West Dawson Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83360, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
